titles.title: Expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Herbert H. Bateman, a Representative from the Commonwealth of Virginia.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 573.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/12/2000--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of Representative Herbert H. Bateman.
